name: Mallikarjuna Jyotirlinga
description: Located on the Srisailam mountain in Andhra Pradesh, on the banks of Krishna River. One of the 12 Jyotirlingas and also a Shakti Peetha.
notes: Also known as Sri Bhramaramba Mallikarjuna Temple

name: Tirumala Venkateswara Temple
description: One of the most visited and richest temples in the world, dedicated to Lord Venkateswara (Vishnu). Located on Tirumala hills in Tirupati. Famous for Laddu prasadam and ancient traditions.
notes: Richest temple in the world, famous Laddu prasadam
